name: Сrime Сity
description:
Love fun and endless fun? Do you like cool games with a beautiful world and beautiful graphics? Then Crime City is for you! Immerse yourself in the role of a city criminal who is hunted by absolutely the whole city. car and different weapons do not let yourself be offended !!!

In this game, you have to play as a criminal who is hunted by absolutely all the citizens of this city. Collect all your arsenal and cars to fight off hordes of enemies. Collect a bunch of fun and fun while fighting your enemies. In this game you will find fun music, loaded gameplay and cool graphics!!!

Game Features:
Fun music and cool atmosphere!
Memorable, meeting gameplay!
Big open world!
Very nice cartoon graphics!
